page.title: 12CLAUDETTE'S DAY-STANION
page.content: At 7.30am I usually get up,at 8.00am I am washed and dressed,at 8.15am I have finished my breakfast.I have a cereal called Rice Krispies for breakfast.Sometimes I watch Breakfast Television.I go to school at 8.45am, before I go into school I meet my friends in the playground.School starts at 9.00am.At school on Monday,Wednesday and Friday we have an assembly.All three classes go into the hall and we talk about different things.On Friday sometimes prizes are awarded for swimming and gymnastics, also merit and courtesy badges are awarded to people.After assembly we go back to our classes and begin lessons. Our lessons are maths, English, religious education,science and art we do other things as well.At 10.30am we have a break and all the people go into the playground or onto the field.
